eng_name: Rain Man Or Sunny Man Meter
jp_name: 雨男晴れ男メーター "Ameotoko hareotoko mētā"
description: This meter allow you to check that person is a rain man (Ameotoko), or a sunny man (Hareotoko). Not only for a man, this gadget work to a woman like Shizuka-chan.
appears_in: It's Tough To Be a Rain Man

description: When wearing it while watching, all of the objects and people there will emerge out of the TV like a 3D dimensional image but if anyone touch the image the real vesion of it will go out of the TV and become real.

First you must scan any object you want it. then there will be eggs that come out from this gadget, after that break the egg with using a hamer and Ta-da. You got a replica or miniature of that object.

This gadget is used to make someone resign from his/her position.
People who resign because eating this gadget :

jp_name: エイコーノトビラ Eikōno Tobira
description: First a user must tell what problems he/she want to solve and then he/she will go inside the door. To solve his/her issue, an instructor who resides inside the door will give him/her difficult tasks to reach his/her goal. The time inside the door is slower than the real world. The user cannot go back to the real world unless he/she reaches his/her main goal. But there are a few exceptions though. If the instructor is unable to withstand whatever makes him feel weak or sick or something else, then the user will be kicked out instantly and not permitted to return.

jp_name: もどりライト Modori Raito
description: Similar to a torch, when it is pointed to some object, the object that the user points to will be transformed back to its original materials or ingredients. For example, if pointed at a dorayaki, the light will make the dorayaki transform back to ingredients like flour,red bean paste and egg.

This gadget can be used to repair the defective goods into reusable.
The gadget can restore or do an action as Doraemon demonstrated in Doraemon Came Out! when the gadget did Nobita's homework for him. In Weakness Grasping/(Secret) Spy Operation, it was used to restore Nobita's broken vase.
appears_in: Nobita Express and the Mystery of the Train Hunter

jp_name: さかのぼりボート Sakanobori Bōto
description: The boat can move in the opposite direction of the flow of water.
appears_in: Nobita and the Haunts of Evil
The New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~
Doraemon: New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~

description: It used to reverse an attack to backfire/bounce back to the attacker by waving it in front of things coming up.
appears_in: The New Record of Nobita: Spaceblazer
Nobita and the Haunts of Evil
Nobita's Great Adventure into the Underworld
Nobita's New Great Adventure into the Underworld – The Seven Magic Users
Nobita and the New Steel Troops ~Angel Wings~
Nobita and the Knights of Dinosaurs
Nobita and the Birth of Japan
Nobita's Adventure: Drifts in the Universe
Nobita's Great Battle of the Mermaid King
Nobita and the Birth of Japan 2016

description: If person ate it, he/she will be swelling up and overflowing with competitive spirit.
appears_in: The Mom vs. Rich Mother Battle

jp_name: ロボ子 Robokoユリ子 Yuriko (1973 anime)General informationCasual informationRelationshipsOther DetailsGallery
description:
Roboko (ロボ子 Robo-ko) or Yuriko (ユリ子 Yuri-ko - 1973 only), also known as Robyn in the English Amazon Kindle translation, is a gadget and character brought by Doraemon from the 22nd century.
Yuriko is a robot girl with the appearance of a 10-12 years old girl. She has fair skin, blue eyes and red hair in a yellow bow. She wears a blue dress and boots.
Roboko is a robot girl with the appearance of a 10-12 years old girl. She has fair skin, black eyes and black hair with short trims and bangs with a red ribbon. She wears a pink dress and white boots.
Roboko is a robot girl with the appearance of a 10-12 years old girl. She has fair skin, black eyes and pink hair with short trims and bangs with a red ribbon. She wears a pink dress and white boots.
Roboko is a robot girl with the appearance of a 10-12 years old girl. She has fair skin, brilliant grayish green eyes, green hair with short trims and bangs with a red ribbon. She wears a yellow dress with a pair of red boots.
The red ribbon is a switch that can activate/shut down the whole machine.
As specified by Doraemon, Roboko is supposed to be a friendly robot and also a bodyguard, while the target can be manually specified. However, she often becomes jealous when her target gets drawn away by anything else. She does not display aggression to other robots such as Doraemon.
Roboko is one of the "Secret Base Items" in the game. It can be crafted by collecting からクリナッツ(Chestnut), ?がたコンピューター(? Computer) and ナゾの?かい (? or Mystery).

(ロボター)The Robotter is one of Doraemon's gadgets that appears in Moai Statues of Easter Island and its manga counterpart.
This gadget is a yellow canister with a removable lid that houses multiple pink small spheres.
The function of this gadget is to give non-human creatures, human thoughts, feelings, actions, and sometimes even speaking.
appears_in: Doraemon: Nobita's New Great Adventure into the Underworld ~The 7 Magic Users~

description:
Rocky Head or Stone Head (石頭 Ishiatama) is one of Doraemon's body parts and sort of a gadget.
Doraemon's head is so heavy that it can destroy everything hard. Despite its indestructibility, Doraemon is still able to feel the pain in his head.
appears_in: Nobita and the Island of Miracles ~Animal Adventure~
Battle! Cat-Model Robots VS Dog-Model Robots

jp_name: ルームガードセット Rūmugādosetto
description:
The contents of a set are as follows:
Once used, the gadget will lock up the room, with the doorway set with "Password Identification Lock" being the only entrance following the password's declaration. Once in the room, the user can exit through the other entrance(s) such as windows, but can only re-enter through the doorway with "Password Identification Lock". Other gadgets such as "Pass Loop" cannot be used to enter the room, as the gadget nullifies their effect.
In addition, according to Doraemon in Nobita's Fried Shrimp, the gadget runs on batteries and thus will cease to function once the batteries have expired, allowing the person(s) that doesn't know the password to safely enter the room.

jp_name: ペタリハンド Petari hando
description:
Rubber Hand or Suction Hand (ペタリハンド Petari hando) is one of Doraemon's body parts and sort of a gadget.
It can stick onto anything without fingers, allowing to pull things, climb up walls and ceilings.
appears_in: Battle! Cat-Model Robots VS Dog-Model Robots
